column6: eso mma nnya mbabanyin na mbabaa wɔ bea yi do ha."

column2: "Na mbrɛ EWURADZE se wɔ mbabanyin na mbabaa a wɔwo hɔn wɔ bea yi do ho
column3: na hɔn nanom a wɔwo hɔn
column4: na hɔn egyanom a wɔwo hɔn wɔ asaase yi do ho no nye yi:"

column3: eso wonnkesie hɔn; wɔbɛyɛ dɛ efikyir wɔ daadze enyi; na afona na ɔkɔm bɛhyew hɔn; na hɔn efun bɛyɛ edziban ama ɔsor nnoma

column5: eso mma hom nnkegyam hɔn: osiandɛ meyi m'asomdwee efi ɔman yi ho kɔ

column2: "Akɛse na nkakraba nyinara bowuwu wɔ asaase yi do: worinnsie hɔn
column5: eso wɔremmpa hɔn etsir mma hɔn:"

column2: "eso wɔrennkyɛ edziban mmema hɔn eyiyɛ mu mmfa nnkyekye hɔn werɛ wɔ ewufo no ntsi
column3: eso wɔremma hɔn awerɛkyekyer kɔɔpow dɛ wɔnnom wɔ hɔn egya na hɔn na ho."

column2: "Na mma nnye hɔn nnkɔ aponto fi mu nnkɛnye hɔn nntsena ase nndzidzi na nnom."

column7: okumfor ndze na ayefor ndze egyaa
column9: wɔ hom enyiwa do na hom ber yi mu."

column3: sɛ iyi nsɛm yinom nyinara kyerɛ ɔman yi
column5: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na EWURADZE aka mbusu kɛse yi nyina egu hɛn do yi
column6: na hɛn emumuyɛ nye dɛn? Hɛn bɔn a yɛayɛ etsia EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn enye dɛn a?"

column3: Osiandɛ hom egyanom adan me egya
column5: na woekedzi abosom afofor bi ekyir

column2: "na hom so abɔ mbusu asen hom egyanom; na
column4: hom mu obiara dzi nankasa n'akoma bɔn ne ntsintsiman ekyir
column5: ma dɛm ntsi na hom mma me aso:"

column2: "dɛm ntsi na mobɔtow hom efi asaase yi do ekogu asaase bi a hom na hom egyanom nnyim do; na hɔ na hom bɔsom abosom afofor adzekyee na adzesaa; osiandɛ merennyɛ adom biara mma hom."

column7: Dɛ EWURADZE a oyii Israelmba fii Egypt asaase no do tse ase yi;"

column4: Dɛ EWURADZE a oyii Israelmba fii kwaamu afamu asaase do
column5: na aman a ɔpaam hɔn kɔr hɔ nyina do
column6: tse ase yi: na medze hɔn bɛba asaase a medze maa hɔn egyanom no do bio."

column5: na wobonu hɔn; na n'ekyir no masoma ekehyia abɔmbɔfo pii
column6: ma wɔbɔtwe hɔn efi bepɔw biara na koko biara do

column2: "Osiandɛ m'enyi wɔ hɔn akwan nyinara do: wonnsuma wɔ m'enyi do
column3: eso wommbuabua hɔn emumuyɛ do wɔ m'enyiwa do."

column2: "Na mibedzi kan metua hɔn emumuyɛ na hɔn bɔn kaw mbɔho: osiandɛ wɔdze hɔn atantandze n'efun egu m'asaase ho fi
column3: na wɔdze hɔn ekyiwadze ahyɛ m'egyapadze do ma."

column5: na mo guandɔbea wɔ ahohia da mu
column6: ɔwo na amanaman fi asaase ano bɛba wo nkyɛn abɛse dɛ
column7: Hɛn egyanom ennya ewungyadze biara dɛ atorsɛm nko
column8: mekyerɛ egyangyandze na ndzɛmba a mfaso bi nnyi mu."

column2: "Aso dasanyi bɛyɛ enyame bi ama noho? Iyinom nyina nnyɛ enyame bi!"

column5: prɛko yi ara dze mebɛma woehu me nsa na m'ahoɔdzen; na wobohu dɛ me dzin dze EWURADZE."
